verses.verse: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> ye of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>; so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> bright <S%H2385>clouds<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H4306>rain<s%>, to every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

For the <S%H8655>idols<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H205>vanity<s%>, and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%>, and have <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams<s%>; they <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in <S%H1892>vain<s%>: therefore they <S%H5265>went<s%> their way as a <S%H6629>flock<s%>, they were <S%H6031>troubled<s%>, because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

Mine <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and I <S%H6485>punished<s%> the <S%H6260>goats<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and hath <S%H7760>made<s%> them as his <S%H1935>goodly<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

Out of him came <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6438>corner<s%>, out of him the <S%H3489>nail<s%>, out of him the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>, out of him every <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

Â¶ And they shall be as <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, which tread <S%H947>down<s%> their enemies in the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with them, and the <S%H7392>riders<s%> on <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall be <S%H3001>confounded<s%>.

And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and I will bring them again to <S%H3427>place<s%> them; for I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon them: and they shall be as <S%H834>though<s%> I had not cast them <S%H2186>off<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and will <S%H6030>hear<s%> them.

And they of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man, and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine<s%>: yea, their <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and be <S%H8055>glad<s%>; their <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
I will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> for them, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them; for I have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them: and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> as they have <S%H7235>increased<s%>.

And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> them among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and they shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me in far <S%H4801>countries<s%>; and they shall <S%H2421>live<s%> with their <S%H1121>children<s%>, and turn <S%H7725>again<s%>.

I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> also out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them out of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>; and place shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> for them.

And he shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H6869>affliction<s%>, and shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and all the <S%H4688>deeps<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up<s%>: and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> shall be brought <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall depart <S%H5493>away<s%>.
And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> them in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and they shall walk up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
